title: 03/11/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 03/11/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, the basketball talk heats up as championship week continues

across college basketball. Today also marks the one year anniversary of the sports world

shutting down, starting with the NBA suspending their season. Sports Illustrated’s Chris Mannix

joins the show in the first hour to look back at where he was and what he was doing when the

league decided to shut things down. He also breaks down how the league is moving forward in

terms of three point shooting and how the game is played. FOX college basketball reporter

Doug Gottlieb joined Dan in the second hour to break down the beginning of the madness that

is championship week. Lastly, Gonzaga head coach Mark Few joins in the final hour to talk

about his team’s undefeated season and looks ahead toward trying to complete the perfect

season.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
